Sweet Tooth Party!

  • Final Senior Project

  • 2013

Final Senior project - Sweet Tooth Party! was a 2D arcade platformer game developed using the Gamemaker game engine.

Inspired by Super Mario Bros, Sweet Tooth Party! was about a tooth that travelled across candy land, beat candy and grew stronger with milk, eventually meeting its final boss: The Dentist.
